body_html:
has anyone had any luck with this? I also get the error.
Same platform as paolof89.
CPU works fine.

InternalError (see above for traceback): Blas GEMM launch failed : a.shape=(1, 135), b.shape=(135, 512), m=1, n=512, k=135

body:
has anyone had any luck with this? I also get the error.
Same platform as paolof89. 
CPU works fine.

InternalError (see above for traceback): Blas GEMM launch failed : a.shape=(1, 135), b.shape=(135, 512), m=1, n=512, k=135
	 [[Node: stacked_cell_1/rnn/while/rnn/multi_rnn_cell/cell_0/cell_0/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/MatMul = MatMul[T=DT_FLOAT, transpose_a=false, transpose_b=false, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/gpu:0"](stacked_cell_1/rnn/while/rnn/multi_rnn_cell/cell_0/cell_0/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/concat, stacked_cell_1/rnn/while/rnn/multi_rnn_cell/cell_0/cell_0/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/lstm_cell/MatMul/Enter)]]
